title: Especially for Hextech Crafting, do Co-op vs AI games count as a "matchmade queue"?
body:
The support article for [Hextech Crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) says that "key fragments will sometimes drop after victory in any matchmade game mode." Do bot games qualify, and, if yes, are drop rates there bugged?

The [IP reward article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752824-Reward-IP-XP-System-Breakdown#h5) says that First Win of the Day is only available in matchmaking queues, and Co-op definitely awards FWotD. Furthermore, the [LeaverBuster article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ#h1q4) includes Co-op as a "game you have to queue up for." Additionally, the [Honor System article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751854-Honor-System-FAQ#h1q1) also specifies that honor is available in all matchmaking queues. As with FWotD, Honor is available after Co-op games. There's even a [Riot post from the Bilgewater event](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/riot-official/OZeWNveN-gangplank-returns-and-the-event-end-draws-near?comment=000900000001000000010000) stating that Co-op counts as a matchmade queue.

On the other hand, the [Chat Restriction article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752984-Restricted-Chat-Mode#h1q6) directly says that Co-op games *aren't* matchmade games. That seems strangely contrary.

As such, is Co-op considered a "matchmade queue" and is thus supposed to drop key fragments? If yes, has anyone actually found a key fragment there? I've gotten 35 Co-op wins since the Crafting system was released and never gotten a fragment drop there. If no, could the appropriate articles be amended to state "matchmade *PvP* queues" to avoid future confusion?

replies.body: I can see how it could be a little confusing.  While Co-op is considered matchmade for some things, key fragments/hextech chests aren't available in co-op vs. AI games.  I reached out to the team to see if we can clarify the support page :)
